abstract: Specialized apps provide help with many seasonal pursuits, including planning vacation activities, packing for a trip and even grilling the perfect steak.
snippet: Specialized apps provide help with many seasonal pursuits, including planning vacation activities, packing for a trip and even grilling the perfect steak.
lead_paragraph: Summer has arrived, with long days and warm sun tempting us to experience the outdoors and traveling. Getting the right apps for your phone and tablet can help you have a great time.

headline.main: Video Feature: Apps for Summer Travel, Concerts and Grilling
headline.print_headline: Sidekicks for Summer Pastimes and Getaways
